title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Island Ford Native Landscaping
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants     Native Landscaping     Island Ford Native Landscaping                  Island Ford Native Landscaping            Â    Click on the colored circles in the image above to learn more about the native landscaping found in front of our Island Ford headquarters. Links to the plants are also found below.  Azalea Coreopsis Dutchman's Pipevine Goldenrod Hibiscus Hyssop Ironweed Joe Pye Weed Liatris Mountain Mint Muhlygrass Orange Coneflower Purple Coneflower Rattlesnake Master Red Chokeberry Slender Mint Swamp Sunflower Switchgrass Thoroughwort Woodland Sunflower
